# Programming Fundamentals

A series of workshops, typically run in weeks 1 and 2 of the apprenticeships bootcamp, that introduce control flow, Arrays, Hashes, methods and Classes.

- [Control flow](./control_flow)
- [Arrays](./arrays)
- [Hashes](./hashes)
- [Methods](./methods)
- [Classes](./classes)
